Node.gloss: to be seen|to become visible|to appear
Node.definition: = process by which humans, deities, or objects become perceptible, primarily though not necessarily exclusively to the eye
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= group of oak trees; ◄ located near Hebron (חֶבְרֹון) ► one of the places where Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) pitched his tents
= location with oak trees (אֵלֹון) near Hebron (חֶבְרֹון) where Abram (אַבְרָם) (Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) pitched his tents
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity
= the opening by which a person enters or exits an enclosed space, such as a house, a tent, a temple, or a larger area like a city; it can also be used figuratively to denote the mouth
= construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary
= state in which the atmosphere has a relatively high temperature
= the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark
to lift up (one's eye, face); hence: = action by which humans direct their face or eyes away from the ground so that they can see what is in the distance or in the sky

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= state in which humans, deities or animals place themselves in a certain location in an upright position

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= action by which humans purposefully move in the direction of (another) human, deity, or object to engage with them
= the opening by which a person enters or exits an enclosed space, such as a house, a tent, a temple, or a larger area like a city; it can also be used figuratively to denote the mouth
= construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
literally: to find favor; hence: = state in which humans find the approval of deities or (other) humans
= state in which humans have a positive and compassionate attitude towards other humans

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= small quantity of objects or substance

Node.gloss: to take a bath|to bathe|to wash
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or animals wash (part of) their own body or someone else's body or another object, usually with water, ► in order to remove any dirt; ≈ the resulting cleanness often symbolizes ritual cleanness, innocence, or even holiness

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit
= a relatively small quantity of food
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

= the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= referent to the time after the event in focus

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans or deities act without delay
= man, also known as Abram (אַבְרָם) ◄ son of Terah (תֶּרַח) ► first patriarch of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) father of Ishmael (יִשְׁמָעֵאל) and Isaac (יִצְחָק)
= construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary
= woman, also known as Sarai (שָׂרַי) ► wife of Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) and mother of Isaac (יִצְחָק)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans or deities act without delay
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= unit of dry measure equivalent to 7.3 liters or 7 quarts; 3 seahs make up 1 ephah (אֵיפָה)
= flour made from ground grain kernels, ► used for baking bread, as ingredient for food, and as grain offering
= finely ground flour ◄ from only the inner kernel of the wheat, resulting in a high quality flour
= causative action by which humans mix flour with water and work it into dough ► in order to bake bread or cakes
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth
= man, also known as Abram (אַבְרָם) ◄ son of Terah (תֶּרַח) ► first patriarch of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) father of Ishmael (יִשְׁמָעֵאל) and Isaac (יִצְחָק)
= direct offspring of animals, either male or indeterminate

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth
= state in which objects are of a high quality and/or a pleasure to look at
= action by which humans or deities act without delay
literally: to make (ready); hence: = causative action by which humans take an object and do what needs to be done to make it ready for a certain purpose

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= coagulated substance; ◄ formed by action of acids on milk; ► made into cheese (חָרִיץ) or eaten as food; ≈ regarded as choice food and therefore often associated with prosperity; because of the smoothness of this substance it is sometimes associated with flattery and untrustworthiness as well

= white fluid; ◄ secreted by women and female mammals; ► for nourishment of their children or young; also used as food for humans; ≈ highly appreciated and considered high quality food; associated with delight, whiteness, purity, wealth, and well being; metaphor for beauty, young age; quality, wealth, and sex
= direct offspring of animals, either male or indeterminate

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to make (ready); hence: = causative action by which humans take an object and do what needs to be done to make it ready for a certain purpose
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a reference to an unknown location; normally used with the purpose of finding out which location that is; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that such a location cannot be found
= woman, also known as Sarai (שָׂרַי) ► wife of Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) and mother of Isaac (יִצְחָק)
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

= action by which humans make the sounds and movements that express either amusement or derision
= woman, also known as Sarai (שָׂרַי) ► wife of Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) and mother of Isaac (יִצְחָק)

Node.gloss: to wear out|to become worn out|to waste away
Node.definition: = process by which objects lose their quality and strength due to continued use; ≈ used figuratively to denote the loss of a person's vitality
exact meaning unsure: = state in which humans experiencing a physical desire for sex|exact meaning unsure: = state of feeling joy
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= state in which humans are advanced in age, ≈ and the body is no longer able to function as before

= state in which humans or animals are numerous and therefore potentially powerful
= state in which humans consider themselves favored by a deity

= state in which a countable entity is fifty in number

marker affirming or questioning the truth value of the information that follows
literally: to bear; hence: = action by which humans or deities let go of any anger or resentment with regard to the wrongdoing or sin of (other) humans
= state in which a countable entity is fifty in number
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= exclamation expressing a strong conclusion, rejecting the event to which it refers to as inappropriate behavior

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= exclamation expressing a strong conclusion, rejecting the event to which it refers to as inappropriate behavior
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= practices that conform to the laws of God

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for
= town; ◄ located near Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) ► town where Lot (לֹוט) settled, when he separated himself from Abram (אַבְרָם) destroyed with Gomorrah (עֲמֹרָה)
= state in which a countable entity is fifty in number
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
literally: to bear; hence: = action by which humans or deities let go of any anger or resentment with regard to the wrongdoing or sin of (other) humans

Node.gloss: for the sake of|for the benefit of|because of
Node.definition: = particle linking proposition X to participant Y, by which Y represents the cause or beneficiary of X
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= man, also known as Abram (אַבְרָם) ◄ son of Terah (תֶּרַח) ► first patriarch of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) father of Ishmael (יִשְׁמָעֵאל) and Isaac (יִצְחָק)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans a take firm decision to do something, often in spite of the circumstances

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface

= powdery residue left after the burning of a substance; normally deposited outside of a village or city; ► used by mourners to put on their heads or roll themselves into; ≈ associated with things that are fine and powdery and easily scattered by the wind, with low status, and possibly with mortality as well

Node.gloss: perhaps|maybe|what if|suppose ...|in the unlikely event that ...
Node.definition: = marker indicating that the information that follows is possibly true but that there is no complete certainty

Node.gloss: to lack|to be lacking|to fail|to dry up
Node.definition: = state in which humans or objects are found less in quantity or entirely absent in a location where they are supposed to be present
= state in which a countable entity is fifty in number
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= state in which a countable entity is five in number
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
